articles.title: Tiger Shroff adds to nepotism debate: ‘Is easier for those from industry but it’s double the effort... - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Tiger Shroff has shared his opinion on the insider vs outsider debate in Bollywood. He says that while it is easier for someone from the industry to get first attention, it is harder to make it on their own.
